primary_benchmark.name: Bull Market Brokers
strengths: Order book transparency (caja de puntas 5 levels by default)
Temporal relevance for licitaciones (dedicated primary market section)
Unified ARG+US view from single account
MEP en un Click abstraction of complex dollar operation
Tabular numeral alignment for price scanning
weaknesses: No macro context overlay (price without WHY)
Legacy UX in some sections (2010-era forms)
Mobile table scaling requires horizontal scroll
